title: Beginning a therapy session
context: Tell your counselor that you had a very stressful week.

content.bestLine: I've had a really tough week and I'm feeling overwhelmed

neutral.text: I've been under a lot of pressure
This week has been really tough for me
I'm struggling to cope with stress
I need to talk about my week
It's been a difficult week emotionally

informal.text: I've had the worst week ever
I'm so stressed out right now
This week has been a total nightmare
I just want to talk about my crazy week
I've been dealing with a lot of drama
I need to vent about my week

formal.text: I've experienced a significant amount of stress this week
I'm seeking support for my emotional well-being
This week has presented several challenges for me
I'm interested in discussing my stress management options
I've been struggling to manage my workload and stress
I'm looking for guidance on coping with stress and anxiety

patterns.template: This week has been [options] for me

lines.speaker: Client
lines.text: I've had a really tough week and I'm feeling overwhelmed

lines.speaker: Therapist
lines.text: I'm here to listen and support you, can you tell me more about what's been going on?

lines.speaker: Client
lines.text: I've been feeling really stressed out and anxious all week

lines.speaker: Therapist
lines.text: That sounds really challenging, have you tried any stress management techniques or would you like to explore some options together?
